citation.article-title: The genus name Ensifer Casida 1982 takes priority over Sinorhizobium Chen et al. 1988, and Sinorhizobium morelense Wang et al. 2002 is a later synonym of Ensifer adhaerens Casida 1982. Is the combination Sinorhizobium adhaerens (Casida 1982) Willems et al. 2003 legitimate? Request for an Opinion.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Ensifer fredii (Scholla and Elkan 1984) comb. nov.

The description is the same as that given for Sinorhizobium fredii by Chen et al. (1988). The type strain is ATCC 35423T=CCUG 27877T=DSM 5851T=HAMBI 2075T=ICMP 11139T=IFO 14780T=LMG 6217T=NRRL B-14594T=USDA 205T.
